content:
Erica Treiber  goes up to spike the ball during game against Texas AM on Nov PERIOD   at ThompsonBoling Arena PERIOD

The No PERIOD  Tennessee Lady Vols   SEC got their seventh win in a row as they picked up a road conference win over the Mississippi State Lady Bulldogs   SEC PERIOD Tennessee traveled to Starkville on Sunday and collected their third straight set conference win of the year with it being the second at the expense of the Lady Bulldogs PERIOD

The two teams previously met in Knoxville back on Oct PERIOD  PERIOD The match went to the Lady Vols in a  sweep PERIOD

On Sunday the Lady Vols would grind out the first set taking it by a score of  PERIOD Tennessee overcame Mississippi States  percent hitting clip by outnumbering them in kills  to nine PERIOD Tennessee also had two service aces in the set one from Callie Williams and the other from Erica Treiber PERIOD

The second set would prove to be even tougher for the Lady Vols PERIOD While Tennessee found its offensive rhythm its defense struggled to stop Mississippi State allowing them to convert  percent of their attacks PERIOD

Falling behind  the Lady Vols used a timeout to spark a  run to comeback and claim the second set to go up  PERIOD Assistant coach Tyler Adams said this was the turning point ofthe match PERIOD

My confidence went up after learning how to control the line shot more Grubbs said PERIOD I was testing it a little bit more in this game PERIOD It was a big confidence booster being able to have success there. both middle blockers had productive days for Tennessee PERIOD

Sophomore Addisyn Rowe finished with  kills at a  percent clip PERIOD She also chipped in with four digs and two blocks on the defensive end PERIOD

Senior Erica Treiber filled the stat sheet with eight kills four digs two blocks and two service aces PERIOD This was her sixteenth match hitting . . percent so far this season PERIOD The Lady Vols are  in those matches  in SEC play PERIOD

Sedona Hansen was the engine of the offense in the match collecting  assists on the afternoon PERIOD

Tennessee will look to extend its winning streak when the team travels to Columbia Missouri to take on the Missouri Tigers   PERIOD In their previous meeting Tennessee prevailed in five sets PERIOD The match will begin on Wednesday at  p.m PERIOD
